thread.title: BRIEF-Atkore International Group Announces Secondary Public Offering Of Common Stock By Selling Stockholder

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Atkore International Group Announces Secondary Public Offering Of Common Stock By Selling Stockholder

organizations.name: brief-atkore international group announces secondary public offering of common

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Atkore International Group Inc:
* ATKORE INTERNATIONAL GROUP INC. ANNOUNCES SECONDARY PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK BY SELLING STOCKHOLDER
* ATKORE INTERNATIONAL GROUP - ANNOUNCED AN OFFERING OF 6 MILLION SHARES OF COMPANYâ€˜S COMMON STOCK ON AN UNDERWRITTEN BASIS BY SELLING STOCKHOLDER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
